use_cases.case: The sequence of the Halobellus limi CGMCC 1.10331 chromosome (CP031311) was used as the reference in a phylogenetic analysis of DndCD and PbeAC sequences.
The sequence of the Halobellus limi CGMCC 1.10331 chromosome (CP031311) was used in a study of the diversity of phosphorothioate (PT) systems in prokaryotes.
